folderSelect.title: Incito
folderSelect.description: Select a folder where your prompt templates are stored, or create a new folder to get started.
folderSelect.folderExplanation: A prompts folder is any directory containing
folderSelect.mdFiles: (Markdown) files. Each file represents a reusable prompt template.
folderSelect.feature1: Store prompts as Markdown files with YAML frontmatter
folderSelect.feature2Suffix: in your templates for dynamic content
folderSelect.feature3: Fill in variables and copy to any AI assistant
folderSelect.selectFolderHint: You can select an existing folder or create a new one

list.title: Prompts
list.emptyHint: Create a new prompt to get started

editor.addVariablesHint: Add variables using {{name}} syntax in your template

newDialog.title: Create New Prompt
newDialog.description: Start with a blank template or generate one with AI
newDialog.placeholder: E.g., A prompt for writing blog posts about technology topics with adjustable tone and length
newDialog.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Please review generated content.
newDialog.pleaseDescribe: Please describe the prompt you want to generate

deleteDialog.title: Delete Prompt
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

variables.title: Variables
variables.fillRequired: Fill in required fields to copy

tags.title: Tags
tags.addTagsHint: Add tags to organize your prompts

centerPane.selectToStart: Select a prompt to get started
centerPane.createFirstDescription: Prompts are reusable templates with variables. Create one to get started with organizing your AI workflows.
centerPane.templatePlaceholder: Write your prompt template here. Use {{variable}} to add variables.
centerPane.describeImprovement: Describe how to improve the template:
centerPane.refinePlaceholder: Make it more formal and professional...
centerPane.fillWithAIDescription: Paste your notes, project details, or any context. AI will extract relevant info to fill the fields below.
centerPane.fillContextPlaceholder: Paste context here... e.g., project notes, meeting notes, requirements, etc.
centerPane.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Please review generated content.
centerPane.addMoreDetails: Try adding more details to the context.
centerPane.noVariablesHint: No variables defined. Add {{variableName}} in the template.
centerPane.fillRequiredToContinue: Fill all required fields to continue

aiFillModal.describePlaceholder: Describe what you want to generate...
aiFillModal.aiContextHint: The AI will use other form values as context to generate relevant content.

configTab.editDescription: Modify the template, variables, and metadata
configTab.quickLaunchDescription: Select default apps to show as quick-access buttons
configTab.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

editorDialog.describeImprovement: Describe how to improve the template:
editorDialog.refinePlaceholder: Make it more formal and professional...

emptyState.toCreatePrompt: to create a new prompt, or
